meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Al Lusher Faye Ringel Mark Leinwand Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #295.

td.p: Al Lusher, a high school teacher from North Hollywood, California
Faye Ringel, a college professor from Norwich, Connecticut
Mark Leinwand, an attorney and a businessman from Los Angeles, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $8,950)

tr.td: FARAWAY PLACES
MOVIES
NUMBERS
THE HUMAN BODY
DANCE SONGS
HATS

Faye
